thread.title: CFMOTO CF650G Motorcycle Designated As Official Escort Motorcycle for WWII veterans During China's V-Day Parade
thread.title_full: CFMOTO CF650G Motorcycle Designated As Official Escort Motorcycle for WWII veterans During China's V-Day Parade - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CFMOTO CF650G Motorcycle Designated As Official Escort Motorcycle for WWII veterans During China's V-Day Parade
text:
CFMOTO
BEIJING , Sep. 3, China staged a grand military parade with a total of 50 formations and more than 12,000 troops in Beijing to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the victory of the world anti-fascist war. This V-Day military parade was led by 45 units of CFMOTO escort motorcycles .
M anufactured by Zhejiang CFMOTO Power Co., Ltd ., is rated as "the best domestic motorcycle" by MIIT ( Ministry of Industry and Information Technology ), and features a liquid-cooled parallel twin cylinder EFI 650CC engine with a top speed of 177KM/h, an ABS syst em and an electronically controlled adjustable windshield. The fully equipped audio and video communication system on the vehicle ensures effective real time communication .
The CFMOTO CF650G motorcycle was selected as the escort motorcycle after China resumed this top protocol arrangement and security measure for visiting foreign leaders in 2014 , and has been used 115 times since .
The V- D ay parade was attended by 30 national leaders.
About Zhejiang CFMOTO Power Co., Ltd. (CFMOTO)
C FMOTO has been producing quality powersports products for more than 20 years and is the largest exporter of ATVs and UTVs in China . The company's core values are continual improvement, innovation and quality . CFMOTO has a global distribution network in Europe , North and South America, Africa and China . Based in Hangzhou, China , CFMOTO has a 1,300-strong workforce dedicated to producing quality vehicles . As a testament to its focus on innovation, more than 25% of CFMOTO's employees are dedicated to research and development.
In 2013, CFMOTO announced a strategic partnership with global motorcycle manufacturing giant KTM. The deal sees small capacity KTM motorcycles built by CFMOTO for China, the largest motorcycle market in the world. The partnership also sees CFMOTO and design powerhouse, Kiska, who has been heavily involved in designing KTM motorcycles since the early 1990s , collaborate on the future design of CFMOTO vehicles. CFMOTO has an annual production capacity of 500,000 vehicles in addition to the supply of parts, components and liquid cooled engines. The organization strictly enforces a zero defect principle and has adopted innovative production methods to ensure that every product is finished to the highest level of detail. These methods are internationally certified to ISO9001:2000 and TS16949 standards and all completed vehicles align with EEC, EPA and DOT requirements.
Niu Liping
